dcterms:description: Partial-ReID includes 600 images of 60 persons, with 5 full-body images and 5 partial images per person. The images were collected at a university campus with different viewpoints, background and different types of severe occlusions.
dcterms:title: Partial-ReID

dcterms:creator: W.-S. Zheng
S. Gong
T. Xiang
dcterms:description: Partial-iLIDS is a simulated partial dataset based on iLIDS, containing 119 persons with 238 person images captured by multiple non-overlapping cameras.
dcterms:title: Partial-iLIDS

dcterms:creator: L. Zheng

dcterms:description: Market1501 is a popular holistic dataset that includes 32,668 holistic person images of 1,501 person IDs, with a training set consisting of 12,936 images of 751 identities.
dcterms:title: Market1501
